data.comment: Erik Lambrechts starts the match. Waasland-Beveren with the kick-off in Bruges.
Brugge have been given a penalty...
In the minute 16, Hans Vanaken nets and Brugge now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Daan Heymans is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Brugge's Hans Vanaken scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 40, Waasland-Beveren's Brendan Schoonbaert has been booked in Bruges.
The first-half is over at Jan Breydel Stadium.
The second half is underway in Bruges - Brugge with the kick-off.
In the minute 50, Great finish from David Okereke to give Brugge a 3-1 lead.
Emmanuel Dennis (Brugge) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Nicky Hayen (Waasland-Beveren) is making a first substitution, with Djihad Bizimana replacing Jur Schryvers.
In the minute 65, Michael Krmencik is replacing Youssouph Badji for Brugge at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Din Sula is replacing Joe Efford for the away team.
The home team have replaced Emmanuel Dennis with Charles De Ketelaere. This is the second substitution made today by Philippe Clement.
In the minute 78, The home team replace David Okereke with Krepin Diatta.
Nicky Hayen is making the team's third substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Alessandro Albanese replacing Matthias Verreth.
Michael Krmencik scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 4-1.
